>python -m venv myenv
>myenv\Scripts\activte
>pip install fastapi uvicorn pyd
>uvicorn main:app --reload

===============
query param, path param, 
path param -> add     =Path(discription='',example='')
query param -> 

HTTPStatusCode
raise HttpException(status_code=500, detail='')

http://127.0.0.1:8000/docs
